kv1.3:1.3_0: Sabbe devā jaḷā elamūgā aviññū hatthasaṁvācikā nappaṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṁ atthamaññātuṁ,
kv1.3:1.3_1: sabbe devā na buddhe pasannā na dhamme pasannā na saṅghe pasannā,
kv1.3:1.3_4: na buddhena bhagavatā pañhe vissajjite attamanā,
kv1.3:1.3_5: sabbe devā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ,
kv1.3:1.3_6: sabbe devā mātughātakā pitughātakā arahantaghātakā ruhiruppādakā saṅghabhedakā,
kv1.3:1.3_7: sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino pisuṇāvācā pharusāvācā samphappalāpino abhijjhāluno byāpannacittā micchādiṭṭhikāti?
kv1.3:2.1_0: Nanu atthi devā ajaḷā anelamūgā viññū na hatthasaṁvācikā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṁ atthamaññātuṁ,
kv1.3:2.1_1: atthi devā buddhe pasannā dhamme pasannā saṅghe pasannā,
kv1.3:2.1_4: buddhena bhagavatā pañhe vissajjite attamanā honti,
kv1.3:2.1_5: atthi devā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā saddhā chandikā paññavanto bhabbā niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ,
kv1.3:2.1_6: atthi devā na mātughātakā na pitughātakā na arahantaghātakā na ruhiruppādakā na saṅghabhedakā,
kv1.3:2.1_7: atthi devā na pāṇātipātino na adinnādāyino na kāmesumicchācārino na musāvādino na pisuṇāvācā na pharusāvācā na samphappalāpino na abhijjhāluno abyāpannacittā sammādiṭṭhikāti?
kv1.3:3.1_0: Hañci atthi devā ajaḷā anelamūgā viññū na hatthasaṁvācikā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitānaṁ atthamaññātuṁ …pe…
kv1.3:3.3_0: sammādiṭṭhikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.3:4.3_0: Atthi tattha pabbajjā muṇḍiyaṁ kāsāvadhāraṇā pattadhāraṇā,
kv1.3:4.3_1: devesu sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti, paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti, sāvakayugaṁ uppajjatīti?
kv1.3:5.3_1: yattha natthi pabbajjā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:5.5_1: yattha natthi pabbajjā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:5.7_1: yo na pabbajati natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:6.3_1: yattha natthi muṇḍiyaṁ natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:6.5_1: yattha natthi muṇḍiyaṁ natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:6.7_1: yo muṇḍo na hoti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:7.3_1: yattha natthi kāsāvadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:7.5_1: yattha natthi kāsāvadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:7.7_1: yo kāsāvaṁ na dhāreti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:8.3_1: yattha natthi pattadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:8.5_1: yattha natthi pattadhāraṇā natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:8.7_1: yo pattaṁ na dhāreti natthi tassa brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:9.3_1: yattha sammāsambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:9.5_1: yattha sammāsambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:9.7_0: Lumbiniyā bhagavā jāto, bodhiyā mūle abhisambuddho,
kv1.3:10.3_1: yattha paccekasambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:10.5_1: yattha paccekasambuddhā nuppajjanti natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:10.7_0: Majjhimesu janapadesu paccekasambuddhā uppajjanti, tattheva brahmacariyavāso,
kv1.3:11.3_1: yattha sāvakayugaṁ nuppajjati natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:11.5_1: yattha sāvakayugaṁ nuppajjati natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti?
kv1.3:15.3_0: Paccantimesu janapadesu atthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānanti?
kv1.3:16.2_0: Atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthīti.
kv1.3:19.2_0: Atthi yattha atthi, atthi yattha natthīti.
kv1.3:19.3_1: atthi yattha natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ,
kv1.3:20.4_0: Paccantimesu janapadesu natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ,
kv1.3:20.5_0: Paccantimesu janapadesu natthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānanti?
kv1.3:21.3_0: Paccantimesu janapadesu atthi brahmacariyavāso milakkhesu aviññātāresu yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānanti?
kv1.3:22.4_1: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṁse.
kv1.3:24.1_2: ito cutassa tattha upapannassa kuhiṁ phaluppattīti?
kv1.3:24.3_0: Hañci anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni,
kv1.3:24.3_2: ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṁ phaluppatti;
kv1.3:25.1_2: ito cutassa tattha upapannassa kuhiṁ bhāroharaṇaṁ, kuhiṁ dukkhapariññātaṁ, kuhiṁ kilesappahānaṁ, kuhiṁ nirodhasacchikiriyā, kuhiṁ akuppapaṭivedhoti?
kv1.3:25.3_0: Hañci anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni,
kv1.3:25.3_2: ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṁ akuppapaṭivedho;
kv1.3:26.1_2: ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṁ phaluppatti, tahiṁ bhāroharaṇaṁ, tahiṁ dukkhapariññātaṁ, tahiṁ kilesappahānaṁ, tahiṁ nirodhasacchikiriyā, tahiṁ akuppapaṭivedho;
kv1.3:26.4_0: Handa hi anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti.
kv1.3:27.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:27.3_0: Sotāpanno puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:28.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:28.3_0: Sakadāgāmī puggalo idha parinibbāyipuggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:29.1_0: Sotāpanno puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:29.3_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:30.1_0: Sakadāgāmī puggalo idha parinibbāyipuggalo idha bhāvitena maggena idha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:30.3_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti?
kv1.3:31.1_0: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:31.3_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:32.1_0: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:32.4_0: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:33.1_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:33.3_0: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:34.2_0: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:34.4_0: Idha vihāya niṭṭhassa puggalassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ maggo ca bhāvīyati, kilesā ca pahīyantīti?
kv1.3:35.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano tattha upapajjatīti?
kv1.3:37.3_0: Arahā bhavena bhavaṁ gacchati, gatiyā gatiṁ gacchati, saṁsārena saṁsāraṁ gacchati,
kv1.3:38.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjatīti?
kv1.3:39.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjatīti?
kv1.3:40.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjati,
kv1.3:40.1_1: na ca bhāroharaṇāya puna maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
kv1.3:41.1_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjati,
kv1.3:41.1_1: na ca akuppapaṭivedhāya puna maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
kv1.3:41.5_0: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā kālaṁ karoti,
kv1.3:41.5_1: evamevaṁ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti.
kv1.3:42.1_0: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā sasallova kālaṁ karoti,
kv1.3:42.1_1: evamevaṁ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha sasallova parinibbāyatīti?
